components.description: Tracks issues with tests and testing infrastructure.
components.name: Testing Infrastructure

fields.description:

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: qtest shows cannot overwrite read-only table exception in the clean up scripts
